items.title: Ixigo – Is this journey worth the price?
items.description: The anticipated consumption slowdown hasn’t impacted the travel and tourism sector so far

items.title: Hindustan Aeronautics: Execution strength, order pipeline to ensure growth
items.description: Anticipated contracts for LCA Mark 1A, Light Combat Helicopters, Advanced Light Helicopters and the like, and improving visibility stand the company in good stead

items.title: Should investors bet on IDBI Bank’s disinvestment?
items.description: The real attraction for the potential buyer will be IDBI Bank’s huge deposits of Rs 282,000 crore as of December last year

items.title: Centre forwards US SEC summons for Gautam Adani to Gujarat court: Report
items.description: An internal note reviewed by the newspaper detailed the request for services of summons received from the Central Authority of the USA under the Hague Convention

items.title: Business barons go nuclear in the race for power
items.description: With an outlay of Rs 20,000 crore, the government aims to achieve a nuclear power generation capacity of 100 GW by 2047.
